      • getXsdForVersion

        public java.lang.String getXsdForVersion(ee.ria.dhx.util.CapsuleVersionEnum version)
                                  throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method finds config parameter which contains link to XSD for given version.
        Parameters:
        version - - version for which to find XSD
        Returns:
        - link to XSD file for given version
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown then no XSD file is defined for given version

      • getAdresseesFromContainer

        public java.util.List<ee.ria.dhx.types.CapsuleAdressee> getAdresseesFromContainer(java.lang.Object containerObject)
                                                                           throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method to find adresssees from container. Method returns adressees for every existing version of the container, bacause service which uses that method does not know anything about container and just needs adressees defined in it. Given implementation is able to find adressees for capsule version 2.1
        Parameters:
        containerObject - - container(capsule) object from which to find adressees
        Returns:
        - list of the adresssees
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown adressees parsing is not defined for given object (capsule version)

      • getSenderFromContainer

        public ee.ria.dhx.types.CapsuleAdressee getSenderFromContainer(java.lang.Object containerObject)
                                                        throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method to find sender from container. Method returns sender for every existing version of the container, bacause service which uses that method does not know anything about container and just needs sender defined in it. Given implementation is able to find sender for capsule version 2.1
        Parameters:
        containerObject - - container(capsule) object from which to find adressees
        Returns:
        - sender object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown adressees parsing is not defined for given object (capsule version)
